ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting, I saw it go for 50pp last nite and thought that prety reasonable.  I personally couldn t kill Dvinn without getting extremely lucky in a big
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting, I saw it go for 50pp last nite and thought that prety
reasonable. I personally couldn't kill Dvinn without getting extremely
lucky in a big group. Why would you want a barbed whip at 150pp if you
could get a dirk at even 50pp unless you just didn't use piercing weapons?

From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>

And Dvinn is not the only source of the dirk.

But why anyone thinks paying more than steel weapons prices for weapons that
are better than well balanced is a rip-off is beyond me.

>I've seen it advertised from as low as 10pp to 100pp. The big
>difference between the dirk and other special weapons is that
>the mob who carries it spawns often, and has it every time.
>It is going to cause a serious realignment of prices for
>weapons in the L15-25 range. I personally wouldn't pay more
>than about 15pp for one, maybe 20pp if I were in Qeynos and
>needed another ASAP. Any more than that and it'd be more cost
>effective for my friends and me to trek to Crushbone and get
>another.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
